publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2509 Margaret Jamieson: Developing School Meals—That the Parliament congratulates the in-house school meals service of East Ayrshire Council for developing Hungry for Success, supporting local producers and developing the taste buds of school pupils.

S2M-2509 Margaret Jamieson: Developing School Meals—That the Parliament congratulates the in-house school meals service of East Ayrshire Council for developing Hungry for Success, supporting local producers and developing the taste buds of school pupils.
S2M-2509 Developing School Meals (lodged on 2 March 2005) Chris Ballance*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2509 Developing School Meals (lodged on 2 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2509 Developing School Meals (lodged on 2 March 2005) John Swinburne*
